Juegazo, no soy alguien que guste de juegos de puzzles, pero este está buenisimo, buenos gráficos para le "época", la historia, interesante.

If you've somehow never played Portal 1, I would highly recommend it over Portal 2. 2 is still a decent puzzle game using the portal gun, but it's not even close to being a better game than 1, or a replacement for 1.

In my opinion, Portal 2 has much worse writing and atmosphere. It's way to self-aware about the meme-culture and fandom surrounding the first game, and too focused on comedy. Portal 1 had a much better balance of creepiness and humor, and all around felt more genuine, less corporate.
honestly really challenging but i like that
Loved the game, loved the story.
This is the best game I have ever played. the characters more expressive than in portal 1. I want everyone to play portal 1&2. BUY THIS GAME
Great fun, singleplayer or co-op! very innovative game.
Muy buen juego esta muy bien i mereceria mas modos de juego , sinceramente te lo recomiendo

I remember I really got into this game's lore and was obsessed with GLaDOS back in like 2012 or so. At the time I didn't have a good PC so I couldn't play the game. Now I finally got the PC and played the game. I'm so happy to relieve the memories that the story gave me back then and actually experience them hands on. If you like puzzles and cool game mechanics, I recommend this game.

Bu oyun Benim bırak küçüklüğümü hayatımın oynu ben bu oyunu çok seviyorum eski hesabımda 50 saat vardı ve sonra hesap gitti  :) neyse bu oyunda kendi testini yapıyosun birde eşli oynuyosun gibi gibi oyuna bayılıyorum cidden beğenmeyenlerede saygı duyarım herkesin kendine göre bakış açısı var ben seviyorum

I loved the puzzles and backstory, and the fact that you can do single player (story) or two player ( co-op). Also, the co-op still keeps the puzzles. All and all it is a very good game. Would recommend to players that like puzzles.
make hole in wall to go through other hole
Every single person must play portal and portal 2, art
기대 이상의 재밌는 퍼즐게임. 포탈건이라는 요소가 매우 매력적이고 퍼즐도 독창적임. 충분히 살만하다고 생각함.

What can I say, this is just a totally incredible game unlike any other! I've been playing it since it first came out and ,apart from the great single player game itself, there is also a whole other cooperative game to play with a friend and then there are almost 685,000 single player Community Chambers designed by other players! After playing hundreds of them for a total of 243 hours so far, this is the only game I never get tired of and find myself regularly coming back to check out other new maps. While we're all waiting for Portal 3, don't forget to check out Portal Reloaded which is a great new game from a Portal community developer.
i liked the unique things that you can do there and also the community because there are a bunch of mods you can use

The sequel is very good. It now features new types of puzzles which are interesting to play. And now that there is co-operative u can now force ur friend at gun-point to buy this game and play together. Totally worth it 10/10

«Если жизнь одаривает вас лимонами — не делайте лимонад. Заставьте жизнь забрать их обратно! Разозлитесь! «Мне не нужны твои проклятые лимоны! Что мне с ними делать?» Требуйте встречи с менеджером, отвечающим за жизнь! Заставьте жизнь пожалеть о том дне, когда она решила одарить Кейва Джонсона лимонами! Вы знаете, кто я? Я тот, кто сожжет ваш дом! Я заставлю своих инженеров изобрести зажигательный лимон, чтобы спалить ваш дом дотла!»
